Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.ontology

Class DefaultWSWRLOntology

java.lang.Object
com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.ontology.DefaultSWRLAPIOWLOntology
com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.ontology.DefaultWSWRLOntology
All Implemented Interfaces:
WSWRLOntology, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyChangeListener, org.swrlapi.core.SWRLAPIOWLOntology
public class DefaultWSWRLOntology extends DefaultSWRLAPIOWLOntology implements WSWRLOntology
This class extends the DefaultSWRLAPIOWLOntology to adapt it to WSWRL. This class is the DefaultSWRLAPIOWLOntology from the SWRLAPI. The code is exactly the same. This is used to make the SWRLAPI class public (by default, the class scope is package) in order to extend it with the DefaultWSWRLOntology.

    • createWSWRLRule

      public WSWRLRule createWSWRLRule(String ruleName, String rule) throws WSWRLParseException, MissingRankException
      Description copied from interface: WSWRLOntology
      Create a WSWRL in the current ontology.
      Specified by:
      createWSWRLRule in interface WSWRLOntology
      Parameters:
      ruleName - The rule name.
      rule - The string representation if the rule.
      Returns:
      A new WSWRLRule created from the rule parameter. The WSWRL rule name is the ruleName parameter value.
      Throws:
      WSWRLParseException - If an error occurs when parsong the rule.
      MissingRankException - When a rank is not used but an higher rank is.
      See Also:
      • SWRLAPIOWLOntology.createSQWRLQuery(String, String, String, boolean)

    • createWSWRLRule

      public WSWRLRule createWSWRLRule(String ruleName, String rule, String comment, boolean isActive) throws WSWRLParseException, MissingRankException
      Description copied from interface: WSWRLOntology
      Create a WSWRL rule in the current ontology.
      Specified by:
      createWSWRLRule in interface WSWRLOntology
      Parameters:
      ruleName - The rule name.
      rule - The string representation if the rule.
      comment - The rule comment.
      isActive - True is the rule is active, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      A new WSWRLRule created from the rule parameter. The WSWRL rule name, comment and state (active or not) correspond respectively to the values of the parameters ruleName, comment and isActive.
      Throws:
      WSWRLParseException
      MissingRankException

    • addWSWRLInferredAxiom

      public void addWSWRLInferredAxiom(Set<WSWRLAtom> atoms, float confidence)
      Description copied from interface: WSWRLOntology
      Add an axiom inferred by a WSWRL rule. All the inferred axioms are stored in a cache. This cache can be clear by calling WSWRLOntology.clearInferredAxiomsCache(). The cached axioms can be added permanently to the ontology by calling the WSWRL ontology manager method : WSWRLOntologyManager.writeInferredAxiomsToOntology(WSWRLOntology).
      Specified by:
      addWSWRLInferredAxiom in interface WSWRLOntology
      Parameters:
      atoms - The inferred axiom.
      confidence - The axiom confidence .
      See Also:
      • TargetWSWRLRuleEngine
